plot: During the Vietnam War, Captain Willard is sent on a dangerous mission into Cambodia to assassinate a renegade colonel who has set himself up as a god among a local tribe.

m.role: In Apocalypse Now, Captain Willard (Martin Sheen) alludes to Lieutenant-Colonel "I love the smell of napalm in the morning" Kilgore (Robert Duvall) as falling into this trope. Arguably he comes across as more of a Cool Uncle or Older Brother.
Pretty Boy: Lance, the blonde California surfer whom Willard describes as "Looking like he never held a gun in his life".
Shirtless Scene: Sheen spends a lot of the time shirtless, and is naked in the beginning. Robert Duvall, too, right in the middle of a battle. Vietnam is hot.
in Apocalypse Now, Lt. Col. Bill Kilgore is a rarified creature; a Blood Knight Surfer Dude. Lance is a much more straightforward example.

f.role: Crazy Bird Lady: One of the playmates love birds a little too much.
Apocalypse Now- although these are actually Playboy playmates rather than singers, and their presence causes a riot.

Playboy Bunny: Cynthia Wood (Miss February 1973, Playmate of the Year 1974) and Linda Carpenter (Miss August 1976). Possibly examples of As Herself, since Wood and Carpenter are both playing Playmates.

name: Apocalypse Now
